statements: SELECT * FROM citizenship_ceremonies;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_age FROM citizenship_ceremonies;
SELECT ceremony_date, ceremony_location FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE attendee_age > 18;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE ceremony_location = 'City Hall';
SELECT ceremony_id, attendee_name, attendee_age FROM citizenship_ceremonies ORDER BY attendee_age DESC;
SELECT ceremony_date, attendee_name FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE attendee_age > 18;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE ceremony_location = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE ceremony_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(attendee_age) AS avg_age FROM citizenship_ceremonies;
SELECT DISTINCT ceremony_location FROM citizenship_ceremonies ORDER BY ceremony_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_age FROM attendees ORDER BY attendee_age DESC;
SELECT ceremony_location FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE ceremony_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT attendee_name FROM attendees WHERE attendee_age > 18;
SELECT attendee_name, ceremony_location FROM attendees JOIN citizenship_ceremonies ON attendees.ceremony_id = citizenship_ceremonies.ceremony_id;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE ceremony_location = 'New York' ORDER BY ceremony_date DESC;
SELECT a.attendee_name, a.attendee_age, c.ceremony_date FROM attendees a INNER JOIN citizenship_ceremonies c ON a.ceremony_id = c.ceremony_id WHERE a.attendee_age > 25;

SELECT c.ceremony_id, c.ceremony_location, AVG(a.attendee_age) AS average_age FROM citizenship_ceremonies c INNER JOIN attendees a ON c.ceremony_id = a.ceremony_id GROUP BY c.ceremony_id, c.ceremony_location;

SELECT c.ceremony_id, c.ceremony_date, c.ceremony_location, a.attendee_name FROM citizenship_ceremonies c JOIN attendees a ON c.ceremony_id = a.ceremony_id WHERE a.attendee_age < 30 ORDER BY c.ceremony_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendees FROM attendees;
SELECT * FROM CitizenshipCeremonies;
SELECT ceremony_location, ceremony_date FROM CitizenshipCeremonies WHERE attendee_age > 18;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_age FROM CitizenshipCeremonies ORDER BY ceremony_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ceremony_count FROM CitizenshipCeremonies WHERE ceremony_location='City Hall';
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM CeremonyLocations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM CitizenshipCeremonies ORDER BY ceremony_date DESC, ceremony_location ASC, attendee_name ASC
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_age, citizenship_status FROM Attendees WHERE attendee_age > 25 AND citizenship_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY attendee_age DESC

SELECT c.ceremony_date, c.ceremony_location, a.attendee_name, a.attendee_age FROM CitizenshipCeremonies c INNER JOIN Attendees a ON c.attendee_name = a.attendee_name WHERE c.ceremony_location = 'City Hall' AND a.citizenship_status = 'Approved'

SELECT c.ceremony_date, l.location_name, l.city, l.state, l.country FROM CitizenshipCeremonies c INNER JOIN CeremonyLocations l ON c.ceremony_location = l.location_name WHERE l.country = 'USA' ORDER BY c.ceremony_date ASC

SELECT a.attendee_name, a.attendee_age, c.ceremony_date, l.location_name FROM Attendees a LEFT JOIN CitizenshipCeremonies c ON a.attendee_name = c.attendee_name LEFT JOIN CeremonyLocations l ON c.ceremony_location = l.location_name ORDER BY a.attendee_age DESC
SELECT * FROM citizenship_ceremonies;
SELECT attendee_name, ceremony_date FROM citizenship_ceremonies;
SELECT attendee_name, ceremony_date FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE location = 'City Hall';
SELECT * FROM ceremony_attendees ORDER BY attendee_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM ceremony_locations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT attendee_name FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT ceremony_date, location FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE location = 'Chicago';
SELECT * FROM ceremony_attendees WHERE ceremony_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM ceremony_locations WHERE city = 'Boston';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_ceremonies
SELECT ceremony_date, ceremony_location FROM citizenship_ceremonies
SELECT * FROM ceremony_attendees ORDER BY attendee_name DESC
SELECT location_name, ceremony_date FROM ceremony_locations JOIN ceremony_dates ON ceremony_locations.ceremony_id = ceremony_dates.ceremony_id
SELECT attendee_name, attendance_status FROM ceremony_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present'
SELECT ceremony_id, ceremony_date, ceremony_location, attendee_id, attendee_name FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ceremony_attendees WHERE ceremony_id = 3 ORDER BY attendee_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, ceremony_date FROM ceremony_locations INNER JOIN ceremony_dates ON ceremony_locations.ceremony_id = ceremony_dates.ceremony_id WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT attendee_name FROM ceremony_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' AND ceremony_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_ceremonies WHERE ceremony_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY ceremony_date ASC;
